org.eclipse.keyple.distributed

Class RemoteServiceParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.distributed.RemoteServiceParameters

  • public class RemoteServiceParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    This POJO contains the parameters of the method LocalServiceClient.executeRemoteService(RemoteServiceParameters, Class).
    • serviceId : The ticketing service id. It will permit to indicate to the server which ticketing service to execute (Materialization, Validation, Control, etc...). This field is free and is for the user's use only.
    • localReader : The local reader to manage remotely from the server.
    • userInputData (optional) : A DTO containing the user input data if you want to transmit data to the remote ticketing service.
    • initialCardContent (optional) : An AbstractSmartCard containing the initial smart card content to transmit to the remote ticketing service. For example, for Calypso ticketing application, this object will be a CalypsoPo or a CalypsoSam, depending on the context.
    Since:
    1.0
